Question
========

Suppose we have splitted time series into training and test sets and estimated three different models. Which of the following statements ARE correct? 		
		
Answerlist
----------

*  We cannot choose the best model using this method since forecasts have different horizons
*  Since forecasts have different horizons we cannot differentiate models which are better for short-term forecasts and long-term forecasts 
*  This approach can be preferred to a cross-validation if the dataset is small

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

*  False. We certainly can!
*  True. 
*  True.
